title: HeyToo 9inch Glitter Women Handheld Fan With Shining Transparent Fan Rib for Wedding,Church,Festival,Dance,Party Prom,Club,EDM Accessory Black
descriptions:
Material:Glitter Fabric and Polyester Fan Rib

Size:23cm( 9.05inch ) long, about 42cm( 16.5inch ) wide when opened

Unique Glitter Fabric with Transparent Fan Rib Design: Special design to makes more attractive and elegant, make you stand out from the crowd

Easy to open: Open these colorful hand fan with glow in the day light or dark under light. Use your wrist quite less make loud noise because the plastic framework of fan, Lightweight yet sturdy, you can carry techno festival fan anywhere

Fit all occasions: the HeyToo plastic glitter clack fan is a Perfect Accessory for Rave,Festivals,EDM,Party,Pride,Dance,techno,Freaky,Cosplay,Disco,Concerts or Wedding and so much more.Useful Tools for summer,beach,seaside and your nights out,also can be used as wall decoration

Colorful shining glitter frabic makes it more attractive and elegant, perfect as a gift for wedding/party/summer traveling/outdoor activities,convenient to carry
